[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fluentui/react-teams](./react-teams.md) &gt; [IDashboard](./react-teams.idashboard.md) &gt; [blockOnly](./react-teams.idashboard.blockonly.md)

## IDashboard.blockOnly property

Whether the Dashboard should render as just a block element. This will disable the toolbar and sidebar from which the user could control which widgets display.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
blockOnly?: boolean;
```
